channel.title: (stone-plaque)[pi] [317]
channel.description:
Can anyone make a code so you have to wield a stone-plaque to attack a person in the wilderness.
HELP Please
i got this error when i tried src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:620: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerHasitem location: class server.model.players.PlayerAssistant if (c.getPA().playerHasitem = 606) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:623: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerHasitem location: class server.model.players.PlayerAssistant } else if (c.getPA().playerHasitem = 606) { ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

It’s not Hasitem, it’s HasItem; very simple.[/quote]
